workExperience.companyDescription: WiseX is India’s First & Largest Neo-realty investment platform by Aurum PropTech.
responsibilities: Develop scalable, high-performance webapplications using NodeJS, Laravel,Lumen, and MySQL.
Optimize application performancethrough code refactoring, effi cient datahandling, and resource management.
Integrated Razorpay Smart Collect to automate payment collections via virtual accounts and UPI IDs.
Set up instant payment notifications for real-time transaction updates.
Develop scalable, high-performance web applications using NodeJS, Laravel, Lumen, MySQL, Microservices.
Optimize application performance through code refactoring, efficient data handling, and resource management.

workExperience.companyDescription: GreenHonchos is a full-stack D2C enabler, an e-commerce agency that provides end-to-end e-commerce solutions for D2C brands including digital branding.
responsibilities: Conduct client meetings to gather requirements and oversee the development process from planning to delivery.
Lead the team in planning, development, and execution to achieve project goals.
Develop scalable REST APIs and high-performance applications.
Implement security measures such as encryption, secure coding practices, and access controls.
Managed multiple collection modes (RTGS, NEFT, IMPS, UPI) while ensuring seamless and secure payment processes, adhering to PCI-DSS compliance.
